model - package model
 
Model - Interface in model
Model interface
Defines the following functions:
void selectDomain(String domainName, String arguments) - select the domain using factory
void selectAlgorithm(String algorithmName) - select the algorithm using factory
void selectHeuristic(String heuristicName) - select the heuristic using factory
void solveDomain() - solve the domain's problem and notify
CommonSearcher getAlgorithm() - return the instance of the algorithm that was chosen for this Model
model.algorithms - package model.algorithms
 
model.domains - package model.domains
 
ModelManager - Class in model
ModelManager class is a singleTone Class which will manage all the models that running
MyModel - Class in model
This class defines a search domain(CommonSearchDomain) and it's properties:
Searcher algorithm - the search algorithm to solve the domain
Solution solution - contains the Solution for the domain search problem.
MyModel() - Constructor for class model.MyModel
default c'tor. get the only instance of the solutionManager
MyModel(MyModel) - Constructor for class model.MyModel
get Model and initialize all the data member in the class
